rukus.text: sillo jineun byeoldeul-eul dugo maeng sehanani
neohuiga algoman issdamyeon sillo igeos-eun hanaui widaehan maengselo
igeos-i seongseuleoun kkulan-ila
jal bohodoen seongseolo
cheong-gyeolhan ja oeeneun amudo seuchiji anihan
man-yuui junim-eulobuteo gyesidoen geos-ila
geulaedo neohuineun i malsseum-eul jolonghaneunyo
neohuiui yangsig-eulo gamsahaji anihago bulsinhalyeo haneunyo
neohuiui yeonghon-i mogkkaji ileul ttae
geuttae neohuineun jikyeo bolila
hananim-i geugeos gakkai iss-eu doe neohuiga alji moshanola
neohuiga jujanghaessdeus gyesan-eul bad ji anihago
neohuiga jinsil-ilamyeon geu yeonghon eul bulleooji moshaneunyo
geuleona hananim gakkai issneun jaleul wihae
haengboggwa pungseonghamgwa chugbogbad-eun cheongug-i geuleul wihae issnola
upyeon-ui donglyodeul jung-e issdamyeon
upyeon-ui donglyodeullobuteo pyeong-anhasoseo laneun insaleul bad-eul geos-imyeo
geoyeoghayeo banghwanghaneun ja jung-e issdamyeon
geuneun deulkkeulhneun mul-eul masimyeo
buljiog-eseo taewojige doel geos ila
sillo igeos-i jinliyo cham-ini
widaehasin geudae junim-ui ileum eulo chanmihala
